characters.story: Like a mouth, this character means rebuke and sings "Ah!" spoken through parted lips!
An striking symbol for adultery that sings "Jyan!" cheerfully!
The strokes unite to show baby, singing "Ying!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
This character represents father's sister, singing "Goo!" cheerfully!
Picture nanny taking form - it whispers "Moo" with vivid energy!
